message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider a counteroffer of $8,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but $8,000 is quite a bit lower than I can consider.  Could you do $12,000? This product is truly top-notch and will provide you with significant value.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $10,000 for the product?
